column4: I need a program for taking backup of a partition on my laptop to an external harddrive. What I'd like is a program that automates the process and does incremental backup. Anyone know of such an app?
rsync is a command line tool which I'm planning to use. it requires a bit of manual work to get it working, but then how it works is brilliant :).
aaahh. I've used that one at work, but I didn't think about it :-)
someone also recommended kdar or bacula to me but don't know about those. kdar has good encryption at least
I'm soon getting too many alternatives ;-)
